What is co-participant's relationship to the subject?

Select the most appropriate choice
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Spouse, partner, or companion (including ex-spouse, ex-partner, fiancé(e), boyfriend, girlfriend) | 2, Child (by blood or through marriage or adoption) | 3, Sibling (by blood or through marriage or adoption) | 4, Other relative (by blood or through marriage or adoption) | 5, Friend, neighbor, or someone known through family, friends, work, or community (e.g., church) | 6, Paid caregiver, health care provider, or clinician

Field Label: How long has the co-participant known the participant (in years)?
Does the co-participant live with the participant?

What is the primary mode of contact with the participant?

 

Select the most appropriate choice:
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, In-person | 2, Telephone | 3, Video conferencing | 4, Texting or email | 5, Social media platforms | 6, Other (Specify) {modeofcontact_other}

Field Label:
What is the approximate frequency of contact?

 

Select the most appropriate choice:
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Daily | 2, At least three times per week | 3, Weekly | 4, At least three times per month | 5, Monthly | 6, Less than once a month

Field Label:
What is the average amount of time spent in contact with the participant during each encounter?

Select the most appropriate choice:
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Less than 5 minutes (appropriate for texting or email and may be applicable to other modes of contact as well) | 2, 5-15 minutes | 3, 15-30 minutes | 4, 30-60 minutes | 5, Longer than one hour
